Single Word - A single word game" "
Multiple Words - A game with a few words" "
Paragraph - A game with a TON of words" "

To add customized phrases to the various game modes select "Add Words" in the Main Menu." "

To change settings select the Settings from the toolbar at the top right"

"Welcome to TapTapTap, an App designed to test and improve your texting skills." "
Rules:" "
1) The game begins after a game mode has been selected and any character is typed." "
2) The game ends once the phrase is complete." "
3) Type correct letters to gain points. Each correct letter is worth 1 point and each letter removed is worth -1 point. The score cannot be negative." "
4) Correctly typed words award bonus points on completion of the phrase." "
5) GWAM (Gross Words A Minute) statistics for all words and correctly typed words are displayed after completion." "
6) The value for Gross Correct Words A Minute determines a score multiplier, so type as many words correctly as possible!" "
7) Have fun :)"
